column6: Close to Bush Int. Airport/ IAH (Houston's main airport), Deerbrook mall, Hwy 59 (runs through the heart of Houston, straight shot to downtown), restaurants, parks. \nThe neighborhood is very safe. Great for couples, solo adventurers, groups, and families (with kids).\nVery clean, non-smoking, no pets.
column9: Spacious, cozy room for Super Bowl travelers
